author: Arsene Lupin III
subject: Re: Lupin and "Metal Gear Solid"- pure coincidence...?
body:
> Did everyone know that David Hayter did the dub voice for Lupin in 
> Castle of
> Cagliostro? (manga dub) Hayter did the voice of Solid snake, stared 
> in the
> Guyver 2, and wrote the screenplay for the X-men movie.

Well, Well, WELL! Here's a little tidbit of trivia for you:

David Hayter (Manga Video voice for Lupin III): Solid Snake in "Metal
Gear Solid"
Cam Clarke (Streamline Pictures voice for Lupin III): Liquid Snake in
"Metal Gear Solid." 

HMMMM!!!! ISN'T THAT interesting???!!!

BTW, I'm taking a stab at the possibility that the David Hayter from the
Guyver 2 and X-men screenplay is a different man from Snake/Lupin, and
that the Internet Movie DB has crossed a wire or two.... but then, I've
never seen "Guyver 2", so....
Also, Cam Clarke has gone by other names, so "Cam Clarke" may not be in
MGS' credits, FYI....

Thank you.

<Webmaster@LupintheThird.nospam.com>
